title: If Biden wins, do you think he will run for reelection in 2024? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: “If Biden wins, do you think he will run for reelection in 2024?” Nobody can possibly know the answer to that. Biden is certainly sharper, and much more healthy and vigorous than Trump—and much more likely to still be all there physically and mentally after four years. However, at the end of his first term, he may feel he’s done enough to restore the nation and it’s time for someone else.

Absolutely no. He won’t won’t finish his first term. Harris will take over and follow through on her threats to raise taxes, abolish fracking that has helped the US be the only country reducing emissions, confiscate certain semi automatic weapons and pack the court. That is only the start to damaging the economy and our way of life.
